liability_cap: No explicit liability cap stated (includes consultant indemnity for third-party claims).
risk_explanation: The agreement contains broad confidentiality and IP/inventions obligations and includes an indemnity by the consultant for third-party claims, but no explicit limitation of liability is shown in the excerpts. Termination is allowed on prior written notice with no stated notice period, creating uncertainty. From a small SaaS vendor perspective, the lack of a liability cap and potentially expansive obligations increase risk.
